name: ABC Consultants
description:
ABC Consultants is India's leading executive search and talent advisory firm, proudly shaping the future of multinationals and Indian businesses for over 50 years. 

Their team of 150 consultants spans 22 industry verticals and brings an agile mind-set, an empathetic perspective and an entrepreneurial spirit to every client engagement. We have helped our clients hire top-tier leadership talent, driving success stories across diverse industries.
Headline: Building Careers. Building Organisations.

enhanced_description: ABC Consultants is India's premier executive search and talent advisory firm, boasting over 50 years of experience in shaping the future of multinational and Indian businesses. With a dedicated team of 150 consultants operating across 22 diverse industry verticals, the firm brings an agile mindset, empathetic perspective, and entrepreneurial spirit to every client engagement.
